creator: LinkDesks - Jewel Games Star
descriptionHtml:
🙈Welcome to this exciting world of bubbles for the COOL bubble-shots live fun! (🤶🎁🧸 Christmas gifts have already been prepared for you! Celebrate Christmas with our limited time updates! 🎄🎄🎄)

🙌 Show off your bubbles popping skills within Bubble Shooter! Tap to switch and release to shoot! There're all colors of shining bubbles💫, powerful boosters💥 and tons of gorgeous maps diliver you to a new dreamy bubbling world!

Take on Vikings' SAVING saga and see what will happen!!!
Can you burst ALL bubbles and SAVE the genies🐾?


🌈 FEATURES of Bubble Shooter 2 bubbles pop game:

★ Once You Pop, You Can't Stop! Bubble Shooter is simple yet addictive! Take challenges, tap and shoot! 💥💥Burst bubbles, 💥💥burst stones, 💥💥burst through the bubble wall and enjoy endless free shots! The satisfying winning feeling fix is never far away!
★ TONS of good levels! Bubble Shooter Viking Pop is renovated from the classic bubble shooter game. 🏋️‍♀️ Advanced colorful gameplay with more brain training levels! Bubble Shooter awaits your jump-in!
★ GORGEOUS MAPS! AWESOME EFFECTS! 🛫 Gentle vibe, 🛬 3D effects and ☄️ awesome bubbles' bursting sound is perfect for thorough relaxation! Relax with this fun popping bubbles' game in a fantstic bubbling kingdom!
★ ADVENTURE with Vikings!😍 Bubble pop with cute characters, heaps of unlockable new episodes and a massive variery of popping bubbles puzzles, you simply can't get enough!
★ No WiFi! Popping on the go!🏃‍♀️ Enjoy Bubble Shooter offline whenever and wherever you want!🤳 There're new jewelry bubbles, marvelous new boosters, fire balls, genies and bubble boosters!
(💰💰💰Unexpected rewards hidden in Bubble Shooter!)

HOW TO PLAY Bubble Shooter popping bubbles game?
★ Tap👆 on the bubble's Orb and switch🖖 the bubble to that fits your match. Swipe to control the free aim line for a precise bubble shot and shoot bubbles to burst them!
★ Help genies Einherjar get out of the bubble jungle!🌳🍄🌳 by shooting through the bubbles wall. Level clear as you navigate the right path for him!
★ Beat levels to unlock mew mysterious episodes and receive extra free bubble shooter rewards💎! Make smart bubble shots to reduce steps and to level up your rewards!
★ Merry Chrismas🎄🎄🎄 in Vikings' bubbling world! During Christmas holidays log in daily to get your special Chrismas gifts we've packed up for you!

Have fun RECEIVING COINS with Bubble Shooter Vikings Pop! 💥💥💥Blast all bubbles and win every turn-based battles. The ONLY HOPE to save Vikings' world rests in your magical power (burst bubbles!💥💥).

💪Help Vikings to fourish again!

Bubble Shooter with Vikings is completely free to play and in game coins can be won for free either. But extra purchase within Bubble Shooter such as extra moves or bubble boosters require payment with real money.

😍 Already a fan of Bubble Shooter games? Like us on☑️ Facebook for the latest news:
https://www.facebook.com/BubbleShooterVikingPop/

creator: LinkDesks - Jewel Games Star
descriptionHtml:
ALL-NEW FREE BUBBLE SHOOTER GAME with 500+ fantastic bubble pop levels for the coolest bubble-shots live fun! (🤶🎁🧸 Holiday gifts have been prepared in our 2020 games! Celebrate every event with Bubble Shooter! 🎄🎄🎄)

In this Bubble Shooter game, Vikings need your help to battle back devils! Aim and shoot bubbles of the same color to burst bubbles and win games! This new free Bubble Shooter game is very simple yet exhilarating with gorgeous and dynamic graphics!

In this new Bubble Shooter game, Odin will give you 3 tests:
🚩 Aim and shoot to pop all bubbles.
🚩 Help Hildr to save baby dragons.
🚩 Guide genies Einherjar upwards on way to Valhala!

Enter Vikings world and discover the story by winning bubble shooter games!
Can you burst all bubbles and explore the right path for the genies🐾?

🌈 FEATURES of Bubble Shooter 2020 bubbles pop game:

★ Once You Pop, You Can't Stop! Bubble Shooter is simple yet addictive! Take challenges, tap and shoot! 💥💥Burst bubbles, 💥💥burst stones, 💥💥burst through the bubble wall and enjoy endless free shots!
★ Tons of good levels! Bubble Shooter Viking Pop is renovated from the classic bubble shooter game. 🏋️‍♀️ Advanced colorful gameplay with more brain training levels! Bubble Shooter awaits your jump-in!
★ Gorgeous and dynamic 3D graphics! 🛫 Gentle vibe, 🛬 3D effects and ☄️ awesome bubbles' bursting sound - perfect for thorough relaxation! Relax with this fun popping bubbles' game in a bubbling world!
★ Adventure with Vikings! Bubble pop with cute characters, heaps of unlockable new episodes and a massive popping bubbles puzzles. You simply can't get enough!
★ Game without internet! Popping on the go!🏃‍♀️ Enjoy Bubble Shooter offline game whenever and wherever. There're new jewelry bubbles, marvelous new boosters, fire balls, genies and bubble boosters!
(💰💰💰Unexpected rewards hidden in Bubble Shooter!)

HOW TO PLAY Bubble Shooter popping bubbles game?
★ Tap👆 on the bubble's Orb to switch🖖 bubbles. Swipe to control the free aim line for a precise bubble shot and shoot bubbles to burst them!
★ Help genies Einherjar get out of the bubble jungle🌳🍄🌳 by shooting through the bubbles wall! Level clear as you navigate the right path!
★ Beat levels to unlock new mysterious episodes and receive extra free bubble shooter rewards💎! Make smart bubble shots to reduce steps and level up your rewards!
★ Merry Chrismas🎄🎄🎄 in Vikings' bubbling world! During Christmas holidays log in daily to get your special Chrismas gifts we packed up for you!

Have fun RECEIVING COINS with Bubble Shooter Vikings Pop! 💥💥💥Blast all bubbles and win every turn-based battles. The ONLY HOPE to save Vikings' world rests in your magical power (burst bubbles!💥💥).

💪Shoot bubbles with Vikings on way to Valhala! Help Vikings to fourish again!

Note: Bubble Shooter Vikings Pop games 2020 is completely free to play and in game coins can be won for free either. But extra purchase within Bubble Shooter such as extra moves or bubble boosters require payment with real money.

😍 Already a fan of Bubble Shooter 2020 games?
Like us on☑️ Facebook for the latest news:
https://www.facebook.com/BubbleShooterVikingPop/

Any QnS Please contact:
Bubbleblast@linkdesks.com

container.value: Unit 1402B 14/F, The Belgian Bank Building, NOS. 721-725 Nathan Road, Mongkok, Kowloon

creator: LinkDesks - Jewel Games Star
descriptionHtml:
ALL-NEW FREE BUBBLE SHOOTER GAME with 500+ fantastic bubble pop levels for the coolest bubble-shots live fun! (🤶🎁🧸 Holiday gifts have been prepared in our 2020 games! Celebrate every event with Bubble Shooter! 🎄🎄🎄)

In this Bubble Shooter game, Vikings need your help to battle back devils! Aim and shoot bubbles of the same color to burst bubbles and win games! This new free Bubble Shooter game is very simple yet exhilarating with gorgeous and dynamic graphics!

In this new Bubble Shooter game, Odin will give you 3 tests:
🚩 Aim and shoot to pop all bubbles.
🚩 Help Hildr to save baby dragons.
🚩 Guide genies Einherjar upwards on way to Valhala!

Enter Vikings world and discover the story by winning bubble shooter games!
Can you burst all bubbles and explore the right path for the genies🐾?

🌈 FEATURES of Bubble Shooter 2020 bubbles pop game:

★ Once You Pop, You Can't Stop! Bubble Shooter is simple yet addictive! Take challenges, tap and shoot! 💥💥Burst bubbles, 💥💥burst stones, 💥💥burst through the bubble wall and enjoy endless free shots!
★ Tons of good levels! Bubble Shooter Viking Pop is renovated from the classic bubble shooter game. 🏋️‍♀️ Advanced colorful gameplay with more brain training levels! Bubble Shooter awaits your jump-in!
★ Gorgeous and dynamic 3D graphics! 🛫 Gentle vibe, 🛬 3D effects and ☄️ awesome bubbles' bursting sound - perfect for thorough relaxation! Relax with this fun popping bubbles' game in a bubbling world!
★ Adventure with Vikings! Bubble pop with cute characters, heaps of unlockable new episodes and a massive popping bubbles puzzles. You simply can't get enough!
★ Game without internet! Popping on the go!🏃‍♀️ Enjoy Bubble Shooter offline game whenever and wherever. There're new jewelry bubbles, marvelous new boosters, fire balls, genies and bubble boosters!
(💰💰💰Unexpected rewards hidden in Bubble Shooter!)

HOW TO PLAY Bubble Shooter popping bubbles game?
★ Tap👆 on the bubble's Orb to switch🖖 bubbles. Swipe to control the free aim line for a precise bubble shot and shoot bubbles to burst them!
★ Help genies Einherjar get out of the bubble jungle🌳🍄🌳 by shooting through the bubbles wall! Level clear as you navigate the right path!
★ Beat levels to unlock new mysterious episodes and receive extra free bubble shooter rewards💎! Make smart bubble shots to reduce steps and level up your rewards!
★ Merry Chrismas🎄🎄🎄 in Vikings' bubbling world! During Christmas holidays log in daily to get your special Chrismas gifts we packed up for you!

Have fun RECEIVING COINS with Bubble Shooter Vikings Pop! 💥💥💥Blast all bubbles and win every turn-based battles. The ONLY HOPE to save Vikings' world rests in your magical power (burst bubbles!💥💥).

💪Shoot bubbles with Vikings on way to Valhala! Help Vikings to fourish again!

Note: Bubble Shooter Vikings Pop games 2020 is completely free to play and in game coins can be won for free either. But extra purchase within Bubble Shooter such as extra moves or bubble boosters require payment with real money.

https://www.facebook.com/BubbleShooterVikingPop/

descriptionHtml:

In this Bubble Shooter game, Vikings need your help to battle back devils! Aim and shoot bubbles of the same color to burst bubbles and win games! This new free Bubble Shooter game is very simple yet exhilarating with gorgeous and dynamic graphics!

In this new Bubble Shooter game, Odin will give you 3 tests:
🚩 Aim and shoot to pop all bubbles.
🚩 Help Hildr to save baby dragons.
🚩 Guide genies Einherjar upwards on way to Valhala!

Enter Vikings world and discover the story by winning bubble shooter games!
Can you burst all bubbles and explore the right path for the genies🐾?

🌈 FEATURES of Bubble Shooter 2020 bubbles pop game:

★ Once You Pop, You Can't Stop! Bubble Shooter is simple yet addictive! Take challenges, tap and shoot! 💥💥Burst bubbles, 💥💥burst stones, 💥💥burst through the bubble wall and enjoy endless free shots!
★ Tons of good levels! Bubble Shooter Viking Pop is renovated from the classic bubble shooter game. 🏋️‍♀️ Advanced colorful gameplay with more brain training levels! Bubble Shooter awaits your jump-in!
★ Gorgeous and dynamic 3D graphics! 🛫 Gentle vibe, 🛬 3D effects and ☄️ awesome bubbles' bursting sound - perfect for thorough relaxation! Relax with this fun popping bubbles' game in a bubbling world!
★ Adventure with Vikings! Bubble pop with cute characters, heaps of unlockable new episodes and a massive popping bubbles puzzles. You simply can't get enough!
★ Game without internet! Popping on the go!🏃‍♀️ Enjoy Bubble Shooter offline game whenever and wherever. There're new jewelry bubbles, marvelous new boosters, fire balls, genies and bubble boosters!
(💰💰💰Unexpected rewards hidden in Bubble Shooter!)

HOW TO PLAY Bubble Shooter popping bubbles game?
★ Tap👆 on the bubble's Orb to switch🖖 bubbles. Swipe to control the free aim line for a precise bubble shot and shoot bubbles to burst them!
★ Help genies Einherjar get out of the bubble jungle🌳🍄🌳 by shooting through the bubbles wall! Level clear as you navigate the right path!
★ Beat levels to unlock new mysterious episodes and receive extra free bubble shooter rewards💎! Make smart bubble shots to reduce steps and level up your rewards!
★ Merry Chrismas🎄🎄🎄 in Vikings' bubbling world! During Christmas holidays log in daily to get your special Chrismas gifts we packed up for you!

Have fun RECEIVING COINS with Bubble Shooter Vikings Pop! 💥💥💥Blast all bubbles and win every turn-based battles. The ONLY HOPE to save Vikings' world rests in your magical power (burst bubbles!💥💥).

💪Shoot bubbles with Vikings on way to Valhala! Help Vikings to fourish again!

Note: Bubble Shooter Vikings Pop games 2020 is completely free to play and in game coins can be won for free either. But extra purchase within Bubble Shooter such as extra moves or bubble boosters require payment with real money.

🙌 Show off your bubbles popping skills within Bubble Shooter! Tap to switch and release to shoot! There're all colors of shining bubbles💫, powerful boosters💥 and tons of gorgeous maps diliver you to a new dreamy bubbling world!

Take on Vikings' SAVING saga and see what will happen!!!
Can you burst ALL bubbles and SAVE the genies🐾?


🌈 FEATURES of Bubble Shooter 2020 bubbles pop game:

★ Once You Pop, You Can't Stop! Bubble Shooter is simple yet addictive! Take challenges, tap and shoot! 💥💥Burst bubbles, 💥💥burst stones, 💥💥burst through the bubble wall and enjoy endless free shots! The satisfying winning feeling fix is never far away!
★ TONS of good levels! Bubble Shooter Viking Pop is renovated from the classic bubble shooter game. 🏋️‍♀️ Advanced colorful gameplay with more brain training levels! Bubble Shooter awaits your jump-in!
★ GORGEOUS MAPS! AWESOME EFFECTS! 🛫 Gentle vibe, 🛬 3D effects and ☄️ awesome bubbles' bursting sound is perfect for thorough relaxation! Relax with this fun popping bubbles' game in a fantstic bubbling world!
★ ADVENTURE with Vikings!😍 Bubble pop with cute characters, heaps of unlockable new episodes and a massive variery of popping bubbles puzzles, you simply can't get enough!
★ No WiFi! Popping on the go!🏃‍♀️ Enjoy Bubble Shooter offline whenever and wherever you want!🤳 There're new jewelry bubbles, marvelous new boosters, fire balls, genies and bubble boosters!
(💰💰💰Unexpected rewards hidden in Bubble Shooter!)

HOW TO PLAY Bubble Shooter popping bubbles game?
★ Tap👆 on the bubble's Orb and switch🖖 the bubble to that fits your match. Swipe to control the free aim line for a precise bubble shot and shoot bubbles to burst them!
★ Help genies Einherjar get out of the bubble jungle🌳🍄🌳 by shooting through the bubbles wall! Level clear as you navigate the right path!
★ Beat levels to unlock new mysterious episodes and receive extra free bubble shooter rewards💎! Make smart bubble shots to reduce steps and level up your rewards!
★ Merry Chrismas🎄🎄🎄 in Vikings' bubbling world! During Christmas holidays log in daily to get your special Chrismas gifts we packed up for you!

Have fun RECEIVING COINS with Bubble Shooter Vikings Pop! 💥💥💥Blast all bubbles and win every turn-based battles. The ONLY HOPE to save Vikings' world rests in your magical power (burst bubbles!💥💥).

💪Shoot bubbles with Vikings on way to Valhala! Help Vikings to fourish again!

Note: Bubble Shooter Vikings Pop games 2020 is completely free to play and in game coins can be won for free either. But extra purchase within Bubble Shooter such as extra moves or bubble boosters require payment with real money.

😍 Already a fan of Bubble Shooter 2020 games?
Like us on☑️ Facebook for the latest news:
https://www.facebook.com/BubbleShooterVikingPop/

Any QnS Please contact:
Bubbleblast@linkdesks.com

👻 A big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played our free games 2020 - Bubble Shooter Viking Pop!

descriptionHtml:
⭐️ Relax and enjoy bubble popping with 1500+ fantastic levels!

🍀🎁 Holiday gifts have been prepared! Celebrate every event with Bubble Shooter now! 🎄🎅🏻

Bubble Shooter Viking Pop is an addictive bubble pop match 3 game OFFLINE & FREE! Get ready to aim, shoot and blast all the bubbles along the way!✨

🌈 Show off your bubbles popping skills within Bubble Shooter!
Tap to switch, drag to aim, and release to shoot! Match Colors, Shoot Bubbles, Solve Puzzles, Enjoy and Relax with your favorite viking pop characters with the exclusive customized look! Train your brain and kill the boredom!💥

🎄 Attention! Don't miss out on the time-limited special costume for your favorite role! Such as Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas and many more waiting for you in Bubble Shooter Viking Pop!

★ No WiFi! No internet! Popping on the go! Enjoy Bubble Shooter offline whenever and wherever you want!

★ Holiday gifts! Celebrate Christmas, Thanksgiving day & Halloween with our limited time updates!

★ Tap bubble shooter to switch the color with your puzzle-solving strategies!

creator: LinkDesks - Jewel Games Star
descriptionHtml:
🤩Exciting bubble shooting time! Once pop, you can't stop! Enjoy endless fun in the colorful viking bubble world.

We have thousands of challenging bubble shooter levels for you to play in the Viking Pop! And 🙈 COOL! It is free and no wifi needed!

🙌 Show off your bubbles popping skills! Tap to switch and release to shoot! Powerful boosters, diverse events and tons of gorgeous maps diliver you to a new dreamy bubbling world!

Can you burst ALL bubbles and SAVE the genies🐾?

FEATURES
★ Super Addictive!
Easy to play, tap to shoot! 💥💥Burst through the bubble wall and enjoy endless free shots! The satisfying winning feeling fix is never far away!

★ Free to Play!
All levels can be passed with your matching skill, you can use the daily rewards and generous event rewards wisely to enjoy the game even without spending real money.

★ No WiFi Required!
Enjoy Bubble Shooter offline whenever and wherever you want! Some features require internet access while you can enjoy unlimited bubble shooting fun offline!

★ Relaxing Time!
Gentle vibe, D effects and awesome bubbles' bursting sound is perfect for thorough relaxation! Relax with this fun popping bubbles' game in a fantstic bubbling world!

HOW TO PLAY
Rule of the game is simple: hold to aim and release to shoot. The game is easy to play but difficult to master. Using boosters wisely is an important skill to complete challenges！

💪Shoot bubbles with Vikings on way to Valhala! Help Vikings to fourish again!

Note: Bubble Shooter Vikings Pop is completely free to play and in game coins can be won for free either. But extra purchase within Bubble Shooter such as extra moves or bubble boosters require payment with real money.

title: Bubble Shooter

container.value: Flat 1512, 15/F Lucky CTR NO. 165-171 Wan Chai RD Wan Chai, Hong Kong

creator: LinkDesks - Jewel Games Star
descriptionHtml:
⭐️ Welcome to this exciting world of bubbles for the COOL bubble-shots live fun!
Bubble Shooter Viking Pop is an addictive bubble pop match 3 game OFFLINE & FREE with thousands of fun & challenging puzzle levels! Get ready to aim, shoot and blast all the bubbles along the way!✨

🌈 Show off your bubbles popping skills within Bubble Shooter!
Tap to switch, drag to aim, and release to shoot! Match Colors, Shoot Bubbles, Solve Puzzles, Enjoy and Relax with your favorite viking pop characters with the exclusive customized look! Train your brain and kill the boredom!💥

🎄 Attention! Don't miss out on the time-limited special costume for your favorite role! Such as Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas and many more waiting for you in Bubble Shooter Viking Pop!

👑 Take on Vikings' SAVING saga and follow the fascinating episodes!
Can you burst ALL bubbles and SAVE the genies? Bubble Shooter awaits your jump-in!

🌈 FEATURES of Bubble Shooter - bubbles pop game:
★ Once You Pop, You Can't Stop! Bubble Shooter is simple yet addictive!
★ Take challenges, tap and shoot! Blast bubbles! Burst through the bubble wall and enjoy endless free shots!
★ Thousands of good levels! Bubble Shooter Viking Pop is renovated from the classic bubble shooter game! Advanced gameplay with brain training levels!
★ Great design and awesome effects! Perfect to enjoy and relax with this fun popping bubbles game in a fantastic bubbling world!
★ Adventure with Vikings! Bubble pop challenges with cute characters accompany!
★ No WiFi! No internet! Popping on the go! Enjoy Bubble Shooter offline whenever and wherever you want!
★ There're new jewelry bubbles, marvelous boosters, fire balls, genies and cool special elements!
★ Holiday gifts! Celebrate Christmas, Thanksgiving day & Halloween with our limited time updates!
★ It's a FREE game! Free to play and with tons of fun!— Bubble Shooter Viking Pop

❓ HOW TO PLAY Bubble Shooter popping bubbles game?
★ Tap bubble shooter to switch the color with your puzzle-solving strategies!
★ Swipe to control the aim line and release to shoot! Aim carefully and tap to shoot the bubbles of the same color!
★ Match 3 or more bubbles and burst all bubbles!
★ Help genies Einherjar get out of the bubble jungle by shooting through the bubbles wall! Level clear as you navigate the right path!
★ Beat levels to unlock new mysterious episodes and receive extra free bubble shooter rewards!
★ Make smart bubble shots to reduce steps and level up your rewards!

💪 Shoot bubbles with Vikings on way to Valhalla! Help Vikings to fourish again!

Note: Bubble Shooter Vikings Pop game is completely free to play and in-game coins can be won for free either. But extra purchases within Bubble Shooter such as extra moves or bubble boosters require payment with real money.

😍 Already a fan of Bubble Shooter games?
Like us on Facebook ☑️ for the latest news:
https://www.facebook.com/BubbleShooterVikingPop/

❤️ Any QnS of Bubble Shooter Viking Pop, don't hesitate to contact us at: Bubbleblast@linkdesks.com
We're always ready to help all BUBBLE SHOOTERS!

title: Bubble Shooter Viking Pop

container.value: Flat 1512, 15/F Lucky CTR NO. 165-171 Wan Chai RD Wan Chai, Hong Kong

creator: LinkDesks - Jewel Games Star
descriptionHtml:
🤩Exciting bubble shooting time! Once pop, you can't stop! Enjoy endless fun in the colorful viking bubble world.

We have thousands of challenging bubble shooter levels for you to play in the Viking Pop! And 🙈 COOL! It is free and no wifi needed!

🙌 Show off your bubbles popping skills! Tap to switch and release to shoot! Powerful boosters, diverse events and tons of gorgeous maps diliver you to a new dreamy bubbling world!

Can you burst ALL bubbles and SAVE the genies🐾?

FEATURES
★ Super Addictive!
Easy to play, tap to shoot! 💥💥Burst through the bubble wall and enjoy endless free shots! The satisfying winning feeling fix is never far away!

★ Free to Play!
All levels can be passed with your matching skill, you can use the daily rewards and generous event rewards wisely to enjoy the game even without spending real money.

★ No WiFi Required!
Enjoy Bubble Shooter offline whenever and wherever you want! Some features require internet access while you can enjoy unlimited bubble shooting fun offline!

★ Relaxing Time!
Gentle vibe, D effects and awesome bubbles' bursting sound is perfect for thorough relaxation! Relax with this fun popping bubbles' game in a fantstic bubbling world!

HOW TO PLAY
Rule of the game is simple: hold to aim and release to shoot. The game is easy to play but difficult to master. Using boosters wisely is an important skill to complete challenges！

💪Shoot bubbles with Vikings on way to Valhala! Help Vikings to fourish again!

Note: Bubble Shooter Vikings Pop is completely free to play and in game coins can be won for free either. But extra purchase within Bubble Shooter such as extra moves or bubble boosters require payment with real money.

😍Like us on☑️ Facebook for the latest news:
https://www.facebook.com/BubbleShooterVikingPop/

container.value: Flat 1512, 15/F Lucky CTR NO. 165-171 Wan Chai RD Wan Chai, Hong Kong

creator: LinkDesks - Jewel Games Star
descriptionHtml:
🤩Exciting bubble shooting time! Once pop, you can't stop! Enjoy endless fun in the colorful viking bubble world.

We have thousands of challenging bubble shooter levels for you to play in the Viking Pop! And 🙈 COOL! It is free and no wifi needed!

🙌 Show off your bubbles popping skills! Tap to switch and release to shoot! Powerful boosters, diverse events and tons of gorgeous maps diliver you to a new dreamy bubbling world!

Can you burst ALL bubbles and SAVE the genies🐾?

FEATURES
★ Super Addictive!
Easy to play, tap to shoot! 💥💥Burst through the bubble wall and enjoy endless free shots! The satisfying winning feeling fix is never far away!

★ Free to Play!
All levels can be passed with your matching skill, you can use the daily rewards and generous event rewards wisely to enjoy the game even without spending real money.

★ No WiFi Required!
Enjoy Bubble Shooter offline whenever and wherever you want! Some features require internet access while you can enjoy unlimited bubble shooting fun offline!

★ Relaxing Time!
Gentle vibe, D effects and awesome bubbles' bursting sound is perfect for thorough relaxation! Relax with this fun popping bubbles' game in a fantstic bubbling world!

HOW TO PLAY
Rule of the game is simple: hold to aim and release to shoot. The game is easy to play but difficult to master. Using boosters wisely is an important skill to complete challenges！

💪Shoot bubbles with Vikings on way to Valhala! Help Vikings to fourish again!

Note: Bubble Shooter Vikings Pop is completely free to play and in game coins can be won for free either. But extra purchase within Bubble Shooter such as extra moves or bubble boosters require payment with real money.

creator: LinkDesks - Jewel Games Star
descriptionHtml:
🤩Exciting bubble shooting time! Once pop, you can't stop! Enjoy endless fun in the colorful viking bubble world.

We have thousands of challenging bubble shooter levels for you to play in the Viking Pop! And 🙈 COOL! It is free and no wifi needed!

🙌 Show off your bubbles popping skills! Tap to switch and release to shoot! Powerful boosters, diverse events and tons of gorgeous maps diliver you to a new dreamy bubbling world!

Can you burst ALL bubbles and SAVE the genies🐾?

FEATURES
★ Super Addictive!
Easy to play, tap to shoot! 💥💥Burst through the bubble wall and enjoy endless free shots! The satisfying winning feeling fix is never far away!

★ Free to Play!
All levels can be passed with your matching skill, you can use the daily rewards and generous event rewards wisely to enjoy the game even without spending real money.

★ No WiFi Required!
Enjoy Bubble Shooter offline whenever and wherever you want! Some features require internet access while you can enjoy unlimited bubble shooting fun offline!

★ Relaxing Time!
Gentle vibe, D effects and awesome bubbles' bursting sound is perfect for thorough relaxation! Relax with this fun popping bubbles' game in a fantstic bubbling world!

HOW TO PLAY
Rule of the game is simple: hold to aim and release to shoot. The game is easy to play but difficult to master. Using boosters wisely is an important skill to complete challenges！

💪Shoot bubbles with Vikings on way to Valhala! Help Vikings to fourish again!

Note: Bubble Shooter Vikings Pop is completely free to play and in game coins can be won for free either. But extra purchase within Bubble Shooter such as extra moves or bubble boosters require payment with real money.

https://www.facebook.com/BubbleShooterVikingPop/
